import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";
import RequestSchema from "@theme/RequestSchema";
import StatusCodes from "@theme/StatusCodes";
import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";
import TabItem from "@theme/TabItem";
import Heading from "@theme/Heading";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Update room layouts"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/v2.0/locations/rooms/{locationRoomId}/layouts"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Updates the floorplan/layout files associated with a room, replacing the existing layout list. Use this after uploading new layout files to keep room diagrams current.

**Prerequisites**
1. **locationRoomId** - Use [POST /api/v2.0/locations/rooms/query](/docs/api/locations/query-location-rooms) and extract `Items[].LocationRoomId`.
2. **FileId list** - Upload files using your file upload workflow and capture the `FileId` values.

**Workflow Example**
1. Upload new layout files and capture their IDs.
2. Build `UpdateEntityFileDetailsRequest` with `FileData` entries.
3. Submit: [POST /api/v2.0/locations/rooms/\{locationRoomId\}/layouts](/docs/api/locations/update-location-room-layouts).

**Minimal Required Fields**: locationRoomId (path) and `FileData` in the body.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"locationRoomId","in":"path","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"},"description":"The unique identifier of the room"},{"name":"Authorization","in":"header","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"},"description":"Bearer token for authentication"},{"name":"SiteId","in":"header","required":false,"schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"},"description":"Site context for the request"}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","description":"Request payload for updating file associations on an entity (location floorplans, images, etc.)","properties":{"FileData":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"object","description":"File metadata associated with an entity (location, room, etc.). Used for floorplans, images, and other file attachments.","properties":{"FileId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Unique identifier for the file"},"Description":{"type":"string","nullable":true,"description":"Optional description or caption for the file"}},"required":["FileId"],"title":"EntityFileDetail"},"description":"Array of file details to associate with the entity. Existing files not in this list will be removed."}},"required":["FileData"],"title":"UpdateEntityFileDetailsRequest"},"example":{"FileData":[{"FileId":"88888888-8888-8888-8888-888888888888","Description":"Floor plan - updated layout"}]}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
